mapper.insert: insert into `im-system`.im_friendship_application (friendship_from_id, friendship_to_id, app_id, friendship_apply_additional_info, friendship_apply_remark, friendship_apply_source, friendship_apply_create_time, friendship_apply_update_time) values (#{application.friendFromId},#{application.friendToId},#{appId},#{application.additionalInfo},#{application.remark}, #{application.source},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.select: select friendship_apply_id, friendship_from_id, friendship_to_id, friendship_apply_read_status, friendship_apply_additional_info, friendship_apply_remark, friendship_apply_approve_status, friendship_apply_source from `im-system`.im_friendship_application where app_id = #{appId} and friendship_to_id = #{userId}
